title: Search only returns old results
creator: jmcknight176
content: Since December 2024 I've been unable to get current emails when I perform a search in Thunderbird. Often I search for emails from a particular sender. I know I've received something from that sender within a week or two. I'm frustrated to find the search function only returns email from many months ago, when I know for a fact I got an email from the particular sender 10 or even 2 days ago. The most recent emails are just not appearing in the search results. The problem started in the last week or two of December and has continued and compounded since. I had been hoping that it would clear itself up, but no amount of re-booting my computer or the program seem to be re-settting the archive that the search function looks through. I'm coming into the tax season and I really do need the search function to support me sift through and find the details I need from my clients. Help! Thank you! Jessica McKnight

title: Missing folders and unable to delete folders
creator: denisepayne214
content:
For the last two weeks I have been experiencing problems with my email accounts in thunderbird.

Some default folders such as templates have disappeared I can't delete folders and subfolders that I have created It takes ages to migrate emails from one folder to another Gmail subfolders have disappeared apart from starred and important No option to 'Empty folder' any longer when you go to the trash so you have to delete each item or hightlight all and do a block delete. My sent box only has recently added sent items - not all in my gmail account I have uninstalled all my accounts from thunderbird the uninstalled Thunderbird three or four times now. Nothing has happened, but when I reinstalled this morning Templates was missing from my newly created email address I created a new folder in my account in thunderbird yesterday, but it has only synched and appeared on my ipad or iphone accounts this morning. Local folders account only has two things in it: Outbox and Deleted I am a real dinosaur with regard to techie issues and just don't know where to start to try and resolve the issues that I am experiencing. Has there been a recent update that has caused all these issues? I set up a new email account this morning thinking I would transfer everything from my existing email account to the new one and ditch my old email address, but both old and new accounts are missing Templates (which I use a lot) I have used Thunderbird for years and it is by the far the nicest email platform that I have ever used and I would like to continue with it as everything is so clear to see and sort. Can anyone help please?

title: Updates not showing on Thunderbird.net Releases OR in Download for days
creator: evit
content:
There has been an ongoing problem with the latest updated binary showing up on the main thunderbird.net for days after it has been released. This is a serious problem because users cannot access patches that keep them safe from security vulnerabilities. I've contacted the team several times and was told this was a replication issue with the site or the CDN. The issue still hasn't been fixed.

Today Feb 4th is yet another example. At the main Mozilla security advisory I see the release of TB 135 and TB ESR 218.7. https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/security/advisories/

When I go to Thunderbird Releases site https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/releases/ and the main page and click on downloads, I see the OLD 128.6.0

This is a persistent problem and it makes the users of Thunderbird less safe, please fix this.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:135.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/135.0
